title: 2 opportunities to connect with neighbors through music
text:
Rafel Sgammato is a Board Certified Music Therapist, specializing in work with seniors and dementia care. She does individual and group session in private homes, assisted living facilities, and nursing homes.
Rafel will be at Old Glory Days adult day center for regular group sessions with clients and two sessions that are open to the public. Old Glory Days provides supervision, socialization, and activities for seniors with dementia. In addition to games, arts and crafts, puzzles and exercises, there are monthly programs including music therapy, art therapy, and wellness visits from a nurse.
Music with Neighbors is for adults of all ages, music lovers of all abilities, and is meant to be a fun night out in the community. For more information visit www.nostalgicnotesllc.com
